Html:
There's a NuGet dependency in the samples on Ix_Experimental-Main

but when I try to install it, I get:

PM> Install-Package Ix_Experimental-Main
Install-Package : Unable to find package 'Ix_Experimental-Main'.
At line:1 char:1
  • Install-Package Ix_Experimental-Main
  • ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    • CategoryInfo : NotSpecified: (:) [Install-Package], InvalidOperationException
    • FullyQualifiedErrorId : NuGetCmdletUnhandledException,NuGet.PowerShell.Commands.InstallPackageCommand
Thus no System.Interactive and no EnumerableEx
